anya-e1010n0:12_0: Cakkavāḷa nahutā ga, devāli gaṇa cumbito;
anya-e1010n0:13_0: Buddha pādambujo ṭhātu, sīse dayā tigandhajo.
anya-e1010n0:15_0: Nanta cakkavāḷa bbhugga, guṇa sanniccitaṃ jinaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:16_0: Vande tappūjitaṃ dhammaṃ, tajjaṃ saṅghañca nimmalaṃ.
anya-e1010n0:35_0: Asubhāya hane rāgaṃ, dosaṃ mettāya paññavā.
anya-e1010n0:42_0: Hata cakkārato pūjā, rahattā cārahaṃ name.
anya-e1010n0:45_0: Adāsi paramaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ, saccāni dassayaṃ divā.
anya-e1010n0:50_0: Ādo phalasukhaṃ vedi, majjhe seyya makā jino;
anya-e1010n0:51_0: Veneyyo lokanaṃ ante, pacchimepi tidhā kate.
anya-e1010n0:53_0: Khedaṃ agaṇayaṃ nātho, pañca buddhakataṃ vahaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:71_0: Iti uyyojanaṃ mhākaṃ, muttassa muttiyā saraṃ;
anya-e1010n0:81_0: Minetuṃ neva sakkoti, evaṃ kenaci tagguṇaṃ.
anya-e1010n0:90_0: Na hi so pakkamo atthi, yena jātā namiyyare;
anya-e1010n0:91_0: Jarampi patvā maraṇaṃ, evaṃdhammā hi pāṇino.
anya-e1010n0:93_0: Phalāna miva pakkānaṃ, pāto patanato bhayaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:94_0: Evaṃ jātāna maccānaṃ, niccaṃ maraṇa to bhayaṃ.
anya-e1010n0:109_0: Tasmā dhīrā nasocanti, viditvā loka pariyāyaṃ.
anya-e1010n0:111_0: Aññepi passa gamane, yathā kammupage nare;
anya-e1010n0:132_0: Na tattha hatthi naṃ bhummi, na rathānaṃ napattiyā;
anya-e1010n0:133_0: Na cāpi mantayuddhena, sakkā jetuṃ dhanenavā.
anya-e1010n0:140_0: Yo dhammacārī kāyena, vācāya uda cetasā;
anya-e1010n0:144_0: Yathā vārivaho pūro, vahe rukkhe pakūlaje;
anya-e1010n0:152_0: Sāya meke nidissanti, pāto diṭṭhā bahujjanā;
anya-e1010n0:153_0: Pāto eke nadissanti, sāyaṃ diṭṭhā bahujjanā.
anya-e1010n0:155_0: Ajjeva kiccaṃ ātappaṃ, ko jaññā maraṇaṃ suve;
anya-e1010n0:156_0: Nahi no saṅkaraṃ tena, mahāsenana maccunāti.
anya-e1010n0:180_0: Mayā samā navā vuddhā, tadāvudhehi te matā;
anya-e1010n0:181_0: Tathā hampi marissāmi, leṇaṃ puññaṃva me kataṃ.
anya-e1010n0:194_0: Uppajjeyyuṃ rujā svepi, asāto dukkhamā kharā;
anya-e1010n0:213_0: Evaṃ cintayanto santo, napāpaṃ kattu mussahe.
anya-e1010n0:219_0: Kare kātabba kammañca, evaṃ so nānusocati.
anya-e1010n0:222_0: Pattepi maraṇe kāle, na sammuḷho nasokavā.
anya-e1010n0:224_0: Maraṇā sannasaññī so, sodheti attano malaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:225_0: Nimmalena cuto bhikkhu, natvevā pāya gāmiko.
anya-e1010n0:235_0: Sati āsanna maraṇe, duṭṭho dosoti thaddhavā;
anya-e1010n0:242_0: Saṃsaṭṭho na nulomehi, svativassu mukho tadā.
anya-e1010n0:247_0: Sasokī sahanandīca, dukkhe dukkho sukhe sukho;
anya-e1010n0:251_0: Kimikhajjavaṇo sāva, bhanto kiṃ sugatiṃ vaje.
anya-e1010n0:254_0: Ganthaṃ vipassanaṃ tandī, kāruññoyeva so cuto.
anya-e1010n0:260_0: Puññe cintāpi nuppajji, nirayaṃ so manaṃ gato.
anya-e1010n0:263_0: Citaṃ citaṃ ihevetaṃ, tasmiṃgiddho sa pettiko.
anya-e1010n0:275_0: Kāle uposathāvāso, so niccaṃ sugatiṃ vajje.
anya-e1010n0:280_0: Atikkantā bahū ratyo, khepetvā mama jīvitaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:295_0: Addhā pahāya gāmīnaṃ, kiṃ pamāda vihārinā.
anya-e1010n0:306_0: Saddhā bandhatu pātheyyaṃ, tadesanaṃ iheva hi;
anya-e1010n0:326_0: Na hāsi nevanandīca, na cāpallo kadācipi.
anya-e1010n0:341_0: Puññaṃ sarati ce satto, tadeva sugatiṃ vaje.
anya-e1010n0:343_0: Pāpa kaḍḍhampi niraye, manaṃ dukkhagataṃ pajaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:344_0: Dukkhā moceti yaṃpuññaṃ, sadā kātabbameva taṃ.
anya-e1010n0:347_0: Taṃ padīpandhakāraṃva, dvayaṃ otvā khukaṃ viya.
anya-e1010n0:365_0: Pamādassanti cikkhanto, tattaṃ guḷaṃ turaṃ gili.
anya-e1010n0:368_0: Devadūte ime pañca, disvā saṃviggataṃ vaje.
anya-e1010n0:371_0: Te dīgharattaṃ socanti, hina kāyū pagānarā.
anya-e1010n0:384_0: Sīdanteva jale khittā, silā mahāva khuddakā;
anya-e1010n0:391_0: Dukkhāti dukkha saṃkiṇṇo, haṭṭhuṃ tuṭṭhuṃ nasakkuṇe.
anya-e1010n0:407_0: Miḷha semhādi saṃkiṇṇe, ati duggandha vāsite;
anya-e1010n0:428_0: Puññaṃ punappunaṃ deti, sandhiṃ na nibbutiṃ varaṃ.
anya-e1010n0:431_0: Puññaṃ bhava matikkamma, nibbānaṃ deti nibbutiṃ.
anya-e1010n0:437_0: Nibbinda yutta cittena, vajjeyya bhavasāta to.
anya-e1010n0:440_0: Bhava sāta vasā tasmā, dhīro taṃ lagganaṃ caje.
anya-e1010n0:444_0: Dassetvā matasārīraṃ, tassā jino idaṃ bravi.
anya-e1010n0:446_0: Caraṃvā yadivā tiṭṭhaṃ, nisinno udavā sayaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:449_0: Aṭṭhi nhārūhi saṃyutto, taca maṃsāva lepano;
anya-e1010n0:458_0: Athassa navahi sotehi, asuci savati sabbadā;
anya-e1010n0:475_0: Kākā gijjhāca khādanti, yecaññe santi pāṇakā.
anya-e1010n0:483_0: Chanda rāga viratto so, bhikkhu paññāṇavā idha;
anya-e1010n0:484_0: Ajjhagā amataṃ santiṃ, nibbānaṃ pada maccutaṃ.
anya-e1010n0:497_0: Kimikhajjavaṇo sāva, dukkhī rāgī sa sabbadā.
anya-e1010n0:507_0: Ekassa pivitaṃ khīraṃ, catū dadhi jalā bahu;
anya-e1010n0:513_0: Ekassa rudato assu, catū dadhi jalā bahu;
anya-e1010n0:516_0: Tattāyo guḷa gilita, vadhaggi dayhanā dikaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:519_0: Eka dvitti catu pañca, buddhuppādepya mocitaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:528_0: Eka kappe idaṃ dukkhaṃ, nādikappesu kākathā;
anya-e1010n0:529_0: Rāgo nanu mahāverī, bālo jano ta micchati.
anya-e1010n0:532_0: Nibbānaṃ pañca paccakkhā, asubhāya phalā matā.
anya-e1010n0:546_0: Puḷuva ṭṭhika miccesu, laddhā aññataraṃ sato;
anya-e1010n0:549_0: Mataṃ khajjaṃ sa maṃsañca, nilohitaṃ nimaṃsakaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:561_0: Yathā idaṃ tathāetaṃ, yathāetaṃ tathā idaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:586_0: Saṅkhatampi yathā vaccaṃ, manuññataṃ na pāpuṇe;
anya-e1010n0:606_0: Santaṃ cinteyya nāsantaṃ, santa cintayato sukhaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:613_0: Tāya santañca bhūtañca, na passati kadācipi.
anya-e1010n0:616_0: Rudato assu taṃhetu, catūdadhi jalā bahu.
anya-e1010n0:619_0: Rāgaṃ hantu manīhoce, khīraṃ assuca lohitaṃ.
anya-e1010n0:633_0: Dāni mandaggi hutvāna, pāmojjaṃ ve labhissati.
anya-e1010n0:636_0: Aladdhā kiñci pāmojjaṃ, pabbajjampi na modati.
anya-e1010n0:638_0: Pure marāmi kāye smiṃ, passā mi passitabbakaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:641_0: Kāye daṭṭhabba jegucchaṃ, apassanto pamāda vā;
anya-e1010n0:647_0: Santaṃ bhūtañca kāye smiṃ, daṭṭhukāmo sadāsato;
anya-e1010n0:651_0: Ajja svevā vinaṭṭhena, nāla munnamituṃ sato.
anya-e1010n0:653_0: Kīdisaṃ maṃ tuvaṃ maññi, ahaṃ sabba jegucchako;
anya-e1010n0:660_0: Santo pakkassa saṃsāro, nanto navassa rāgino.
anya-e1010n0:665_0: Anto gocarikā pakkā, bahi gocarikā navā;
anya-e1010n0:666_0: Pakkā nāsāya uccā te, nīcāyeva navā sino.
anya-e1010n0:671_0: Sakkā sakkā na dassetuṃ, subhaṃsubhaṃ sataṃsataṃ;
anya-e1010n0:674_0: Sakkā sakkāpi taṃ kātuṃ, subhaṃsubhaṃ na dhīmayaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:678_0: Tapaṃ nibbāyituṃ icchaṃ, dukāyaṃ duti cintaye.
anya-e1010n0:681_0: Andho ummattakovā so, nattānaṃ maññate tathā.
anya-e1010n0:689_0: Abhiṇha gāhinaṃ rāga, yakkhaṃ ananta dukkha daṃ;
anya-e1010n0:690_0: Asubhā tula mantena, vārehi taṃ sa bhāyati.
anya-e1010n0:693_0: Rāgampi kusalaṃ maññi, jano teneva vañcito.
anya-e1010n0:695_0: Āturaṃ asuciṃ putiṃ, passa nande samussayaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:698_0: Subhato naṃ maññati bālo, avijjāya purakkhato;
anya-e1010n0:701_0: Nhāruṭṭhi taca maṃsāni, saraṃ sataṃ na nindito;
anya-e1010n0:711_0: Yathā tasseva paṇṇādiṃ, khādetvā visa mujjahe.
anya-e1010n0:713_0: Evaṃ rāgo samuppajje, kāye gandhādi vāsite;
anya-e1010n0:714_0: Anto tasseva jegucchaṃ, cintetvā rāga mujjahe.
anya-e1010n0:720_0: Bījā bhāve kuto maggo, maggabījā hi bhāvanā.
anya-e1010n0:740_0: Gehe rogā putī pāpā, vasanti kucchitā sadā.
anya-e1010n0:743_0: Tāpaṃ jiraṃ dahaṃ pakkaṃ, caturaggi chavāyukā.
anya-e1010n0:750_0: Yathā bahi tathā ajjhattaṃ, dhātū bhvāpā nalānilā;
anya-e1010n0:754_0: Mettā bhāvana micchampi, suṇa buddhavaco yidaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:758_0: Yeca taṃ upanayhanti, veraṃ tesaṃ nasammati.
anya-e1010n0:767_0: Yeca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā.
anya-e1010n0:769_0: Kuddho atthaṃ najānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ napassati;
anya-e1010n0:773_0: Paraṃ saṃkuppitaṃ ñatvā, yo sato upasammati.
anya-e1010n0:775_0: Tasseva tena pāpiyyo, yo kuddhaṃ paṭikujjhati;
anya-e1010n0:783_0: Akodhena jine kodhaṃ, asādhuṃ sādhunā jine;
anya-e1010n0:786_0: Yo ve uppatitaṃ kodhaṃ, rathaṃ bhantaṃva vāraye;
anya-e1010n0:787_0: Ta mahaṃ sārathī brūmi, rasmiggāho itarojano.
anya-e1010n0:789_0: Purisassa hi jātassa, kudhārī jāyate mukhe;
anya-e1010n0:798_0: Naparo paraṃ nikuppetha, nātimaññetha katthaci nakiñci;
anya-e1010n0:811_0: Saccaṃ bhaṇe nakujjheyya, dajjā appampi yācito;
anya-e1010n0:812_0: Etehi tīhi ṭhānehi, gacche devāna santike.
anya-e1010n0:814_0: Na paresaṃ vilomāni, na paresaṃ katākataṃ;
anya-e1010n0:817_0: Su dasaṃ vajjamaññesaṃ, attano pana duddasaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:818_0: Paresañhi so vajjāni, ophunāti yathā bhusaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:819_0: Attano pana chādeti, kaliṃva kitavā saṭṭho.
anya-e1010n0:834_0: Hane dosū panāhāni, anattha kārakāni hi;
anya-e1010n0:837_0: Sataṃ dujjana vākyehi, namano yāti vikriyaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:869_0: Santaṃ hi sīlavaṃ dhītiṃ, hirottappena bhāyati;
anya-e1010n0:885_0: Māññe maññantu taṃ disvā, cirappabba jito nuti.
anya-e1010n0:891_0: Na tva tabbisaye nāme, dukkhaṃ mākari cetasi.
anya-e1010n0:902_0: Mahā nattha karaṃ dosaṃ, nibbāyatu sa cetasi.
anya-e1010n0:905_0: Dhammapālo khami tātaṃ, kapindo kandaro pataṃ.
anya-e1010n0:908_0: Nāthassa pāramiṃ khantiṃ, saraṃ dhīro titikkhatu.
anya-e1010n0:913_0: Sāsane cira vāsāpi, mādisāva ime iti;
anya-e1010n0:916_0: Dve usetīti doso so, saparaṃ dayhate dvayaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:917_0: Pahātabbo sa sabbesu, parattha sattha micchatā.
anya-e1010n0:922_0: Jeguccha kkosa nindāni, bālo gaṇhāti akkhamo;
anya-e1010n0:928_0: Nadi kallola viciyo, tīraṃ patvā samantidha;
anya-e1010n0:929_0: Sabbe uppatitā dosā, khantipatvā samanti te.
anya-e1010n0:932_0: Bhave yyummattako sova, tādisaṃ vacanaṃ bhaṇaṃ.
anya-e1010n0:935_0: Gāmamajjhe aḷakkova, tathā māhohi taṃ jaha.
anya-e1010n0:946_0: Idha peccaca nīceyyo, naṃnayaṃ gaṇhi akkhamo.
anya-e1010n0:960_0: Mettā toyena vāreyya, siyā nibbuti sabbadhi.
anya-e1010n0:965_0: Guṇī guṇī nandindāya, pasaṃsāya guṇī guṇī;
anya-e1010n0:968_0: Guṇaṃ nindāya nāsetuṃ, nasakkā koci kussako;
anya-e1010n0:971_0: Dosabbhā mala sañchanno, mettācando na rocati;
anya-e1010n0:974_0: Su sutta buddha supinā, dvepiyā gutti nākkamo;
anya-e1010n0:975_0: Samādhi sumukhā muḷhā, brahmā tyekā dasa gguṇā.
anya-e1010n0:977_0: Sītaṃ karotu mettāya, cakkhuṃ lābhetu paññāya;
anya-e1010n0:981_0: Dhammaṃ desetu pattānaṃ, cando hohi gategate.
anya-e1010n0:989_0: Nākāsi kalahaṃ silā, sadā kenaci niccalā;
anya-e1010n0:995_0: Sabbe ahaṃva icchanti, sattā sukhanti ñātuna;
anya-e1010n0:996_0: Bhāveyya kamato mettaṃ, piya majjhatta verike.
anya-e1010n0:998_0: Sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno;
anya-e1010n0:1006_0: Averā byāpajjā nīgho, sukhī cassaṃ ahaṃva me;
anya-e1010n0:1012_0: Doso mettāya dūrāri, taṇhā āsanna verikā;
anya-e1010n0:1013_0: Taṇhaṃ piyesu vāreyya, dosaṃ verīsu mettiko.
anya-e1010n0:1033_0: Thī pū riyā nariyāca, devānarā nipātikā.
anya-e1010n0:1035_0: Averā hontu byāpajjā, anīghāca sukhī ime;
anya-e1010n0:1044_0: Catuddisā nudisā dho, uddhaṃ sattāca pāṇino;
anya-e1010n0:1045_0: Bhūtāca puggalā atta, bhāvī sabbe thi pūrisā.
anya-e1010n0:1048_0: Averā byāpajjā nīghā, sukhattāca bhavantu te.
anya-e1010n0:1051_0: Dvādase te paricchijja, bhāveyya puggale budho.
anya-e1010n0:1062_0: Dukkhite karuṇaṃ brūhe, muditaṃ sukhite jane;
anya-e1010n0:1075_0: Na bhayaṭṭā na iṇaṭṭā, neva ājīva kāraṇā.
anya-e1010n0:1086_0: Svāgatā vata tebhikkhū, pattā sambuddhaputta taṃ;
anya-e1010n0:1087_0: Gihi bandhana pucchijja, sukhitā sāsane ratā.
anya-e1010n0:1107_0: Iti vuttaṃ munindena, nussaraṃ ani vattito;
anya-e1010n0:1152_0: Natthi sañcicca āpatti, lajīva so pavuccati.
anya-e1010n0:1155_0: Dhura dvayaṃva kiccaṃ taṃ, nāññakiccehi hāpaye.
anya-e1010n0:1160_0: Yathā thambhe nibandheyya, vacchaṃ damaṃ naro idha;
anya-e1010n0:1173_0: Paññāyā nusayaṃ saṇhaṃ, kilesaṃ bhikkhu bhindati.
anya-e1010n0:1178_0: Mahāpuññe ṭhitaṃ sīlaṃ, samādhi appanā gataṃ;
anya-e1010n0:1179_0: Catumagga yutā paññā, etaṃ sikkhattayaṃ mataṃ.
anya-e1010n0:1196_0: Khīraṃ pitvāva jīvanti, jātāpi idha puttakā;
anya-e1010n0:1203_0: Dāyā missaggahaṃ nicchi, saddhamma garuko jino.
anya-e1010n0:1205_0: Lakkha kappa catussaṅkhya, kālaṃ vicita niccitaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:1211_0: Bhaddanta rāhulasseva, dāyaṃ nopi adā jino;
anya-e1010n0:1223_0: Puttā hontāpi dāyesmiṃ, nirāsā tiva ninditā.
anya-e1010n0:1235_0: Āmisesu hane āsaṃ, puttamaṃsu pamaṃ saraṃ.
anya-e1010n0:1243_0: Sīle ṭhitova bhuñjeyya, māditta guḷakaṃ gili.
anya-e1010n0:1268_0: Daharāpi hi miyyanti, natthi vassaggato mataṃ.
anya-e1010n0:1273_0: Etehi caturakkhehi, ganthaṃ sikkheyya saṃ vuto;
anya-e1010n0:1292_0: Tiracchā peta laddhabbe, nāsaṃ kāmasukhe kare;
anya-e1010n0:1293_0: Bhāyitabba sukhaṃ tañhi, tasmiṃ laggā mahātapā.
anya-e1010n0:1305_0: Pariccattaṃ na hiṃ santi, muttaṃ vaṇṇenti sādhavo.
anya-e1010n0:1314_0: Kataṃkataṃ mudhāto na, tadatthaṃ duccare care.
anya-e1010n0:1326_0: Pāpaṃ mākara kāyatthaṃ, kāyo verī vasānugo;
anya-e1010n0:1327_0: Bhūmyaṃ sessati vekārī, pāpiko nirayaṃ gato.
anya-e1010n0:1345_0: Sabhāva malinaṃ kāyaṃ, nimmalāya kathaṃ kare;
anya-e1010n0:1352_0: Cittaṃ vā laṅkataṃ sobhaṃ, sīlādi gandhavāsitaṃ.
anya-e1010n0:1354_0: Sace bhāyatha dukkhassa, sace vo dukkha mappiyaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:1355_0: Mākattha pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvivā yadivā raho.
anya-e1010n0:1396_0: Rāgaṃ chindāti buddhāṇaṃ, saraṃ bhikkhu rahogato;
anya-e1010n0:1412_0: Ihāpi dukkhitā hutvā, te pecca atidukkhino.
anya-e1010n0:1440_0: Tasseva phāsu bhavati, ekassa vasato vane.
anya-e1010n0:1443_0: Pavivekaṃ dukkhaṃ seyyo, yañce kāmamayaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e1010n0:1478_0: Khandhāva honti bhijjanti, añño koci nalabbhati.
anya-e1010n0:1503_0: Natumhaṃ bhikkhave rūpaṃ, taṃ jahethāti vuttato;
anya-e1010n0:1506_0: Puttā matthi dhanā matthi, iti bālo vihaññati;
anya-e1010n0:1510_0: Saññaṃ nāseyya khandhāva, atthīti ābhuje budho.
anya-e1010n0:1512_0: Khandhanāsa manābhujja, mato me puttako iti;
anya-e1010n0:1528_0: Natthi santesu laggantā, rūpakkhandhā dike svidha.
anya-e1010n0:1530_0: Taṇhā gijjhati metanti, māno ahanti maññati;
anya-e1010n0:1531_0: Diṭṭhi gaṇhāti attāti, ete papañcakā tayo.
anya-e1010n0:1533_0: Mame ta maha mattāti, papañcānaṃ vasānugo;
anya-e1010n0:1536_0: Name nāhaṃ naattāti, etehi vivadaṃ kare;
anya-e1010n0:1540_0: Tatheva sabbadā maññe, mā papañca vasānugo.
anya-e1010n0:1553_0: Anattāti girā saccā, attāti vacanaṃ musā;
anya-e1010n0:1554_0: Musāya vivade loko, buddhena sacca vādinā.
anya-e1010n0:1568_0: Sīse pilandiyā modī, sambuddha caraṇa mbujaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:1584_0: Ta dākārena vattanti, avijjo ttharitā bhusaṃ.
anya-e1010n0:1599_0: Taṇhā tassi mametanti, māno maññi ahantica;
anya-e1010n0:1600_0: Yassi diṭṭhica attāti, papañcā nāmime tayo.
anya-e1010n0:1603_0: Bhavayante payojentā, mokkhaṃ nādaṃsu te ciraṃ.
anya-e1010n0:1606_0: Cirassaṃ dukkhitā honti, ārā nibbānato tiva.
anya-e1010n0:1608_0: Name nāhaṃ naattāti, etehi vivadaṃ kare;
anya-e1010n0:1620_0: Tasmā ettha tacovāha, sambuddho na bahicchaviṃ.
anya-e1010n0:1626_0: Ñāṇena chindi tabbāca, tasmā chavīti vuccati.
anya-e1010n0:1650_0: Mukha nāsakkhi kaṇṇādi, chiddā vachidda duddasaṃ.
anya-e1010n0:1653_0: Pittaṃ semhañca papphāsaṃ, hadayaṃ yakanampi dhī.
anya-e1010n0:1655_0: Anna pānaṃ manuññampi, kheḷa tinta madhopari;
anya-e1010n0:1661_0: Etaṃ udariyaṃ nāma, tamhā pakkāsayaṃ gataṃ;
anya-e1010n0:1662_0: Dinaccaye karīsantaṃ, sā sayaṃ taṃdvayampi dhī.
anya-e1010n0:1665_0: Paṭicchanno niharati, tameva nto ṭhitaṃ jano.
anya-e1010n0:1693_0: Santaṃ cinteyya nāsantaṃ, santaṃ cintayato sukhaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:1748_0: Kicca mañña mupekkhāya, saṃsāra bhaya bhīruko.
anya-e1010n0:1754_0: Akiccaṃ te nasevanti, kicce sātata kārino;
anya-e1010n0:1768_0: Saṃmuḷhāte na muccanti, bhavā buddha virodhino.
anya-e1010n0:1774_0: Alaṃ kāyavisodhena, bālova taṃ garuṃ karo.
anya-e1010n0:1797_0: Rattaṃ pātuṃ chaviṃ chetvā, sakkā ḍaṃsādayopinaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:1798_0: Chetvā maṃsa ṭṭhikādīni, dhīro nālambituṃ kathaṃ.
anya-e1010n0:1800_0: Lagganti chavimatte ye, makkhikā sedapā yathā;
anya-e1010n0:1801_0: Thīpuṃ mukhādi saññāya, te pamuḷhā mahātapā.
anya-e1010n0:1814_0: Kāyā subhaṃ vipassantu, dibba kkhināpya passiyaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:1839_0: Bahīva sodhitaṃ yassa, na vanto jeguccha puñjakaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:1849_0: Sobhaṃ sobhaṃ naye ṭhānaṃ, manaṃ manaṃ pyalaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e1010n0:1867_0: Addhā pītimano hoti, macco laddhā yadicchati.
anya-e1010n0:1882_0: Te pahāya tare oghaṃ, nāvaṃ sitvāva pāragū.
anya-e1010n0:1891_0: Taṃve pasahati māro, vāto rukkhaṃva dubbalaṃ.
anya-e1010n0:1895_0: Taṃve nappasahati māro, vāto selaṃva pabbataṃ.
anya-e1010n0:1897_0: Yathā agāraṃ ducchannaṃ, vuṭṭhi samati vijjhati;
anya-e1010n0:1901_0: Patiṭṭhaṃ sāsane laddhā, nukkaṇṭhā nalasā ratā.
anya-e1010n0:1916_0: Taṇhā saddhāna miccevaṃ, visesaṃ jāna tatvato;
anya-e1010n0:1925_0: Kadācipi na duggandhi, sukkhaṃ cuṇṇampi candanaṃ;
anya-e1010n0:1932_0: Iti ñatvāva sappañño, neva kkoseyya kiñcanaṃ.
anya-e1010n0:1947_0: Sodhe citta mupakkamma, suddhaṃ upakkamena taṃ;
anya-e1010n0:1948_0: Vahe sukhaṃ asaṅkheyyaṃ, dukkhaṃ asodhitaṃ mali.
anya-e1010n0:1951_0: Cittaṃ sodhetu mālimpe, rāgadosa malehi taṃ.
